name: Space Balls (itch) (Hole)
description:
Controls-

(1234567890-)         For Space Radio

(Arrow keys)               To Move Around

Listen to the space radio while destroying every ship you encounter in your way with your mighty ball. Why? cause it’s fun.

The Space Radio is new but it’s developing, it has eleven channels with different types of music you can listen to!

All you have to do in this game is destroy everything you see on the screen that isn’t your ship or your ball.

A new ship? Destroy. An asteroid? Destroy.

Guide the ball in it’s path of destruction while avoiding those ships yourself.

Screenshot your highscore and show to your friends.

*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-

I’m sorry I don’t know how to save highscores yet or compete for highscores online. I’ll add that to this game as soon as I learn that. Until then just the screenshot I guess.

Also I just barely know anything about game development but I’m still trying I’ll improve the game as soon as I learn how to do so.

Like I am aware of the fact that the music doesn’t loops in the radio. You have to play it everytime the song ends. That’s not a bug it’s just that I couldn’t even get the radio to work without that. I’ll try to fix that in the future.

I mean I was just proud of being able to make a radio in the first place lol.
